name: Crypt Keeper
description:
Title: Crypt Keeper (Game for the GMTK Game Jam)

Description:
Use your Arrow Keys to move The Vampire around his crypt and bite the invading villagers before they slay The Vampire.

Theme:
-Enemies serve as hazards AND a means for health.
-Harsh Sunlight makes you visible AND Damages you.
-Health serves as HitPoints AND hunger.

Platforms:
Windows

Third Parties:
-GameMaker:Studio
-Moonlight Sonata by Ludwig Van Beethoven (Public Domain)
-8-Bit Limit R [BRK] Font from FFonts.net (Royalty-Free)
-Famitracker(Music Made With)
-BFXR(Sound Effects Made With)
-Piskel(Sprites Made With)
-Made By: Blake Jordan
